text: Te, kotoryye nesut Tron, i te, kotoryye vokrug nego, proslavlyayut khvaloy svoyego Gospoda, veruyut v Nego i prosyat proshcheniya dlya veruyushchikh: Â«Gospod' nash! Ty ob"yal vsyakuyu veshch' milost'yu i znaniyem. Prosti zhe tekh, kotoryye raskayalis' i posledovali Tvoim putem, i zashchiti ikh ot mucheniy v Adu
